# Government Tender Announcement


## Request for Proposal

Title:
Tuscan, Arizona : Accommodation Services

Reference Number: WS4344897573-Doc4367163961

Publication Date: December 22, 2023

Closing Date: January 10, 2024 (1:00 PM Eastern Standard Time)

## Purpose

The Canadian government is seeking offers to provide accommodation services for the Department of National Defence (DND) in support of the Canadian Armed Forces (CAF) at Tuscan, Arizona. The services are required from February 4, 2024, to March 29, 2024.

## Scope of Work

The successful Offeror will be responsible for providing accommodation services to the Canadian Armed Forces personnel at Tuscan, Arizona, for a period of one month.

## Evaluation Criteria

Bids will be evaluated based on the lowest price.

## Opportunity Information

* Property Type: Hotels and Lodging Facilities
* Offerors are invited to bid concurrently.
* Contact Information:
	+ Martine Hunter: martine.hunter@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Regions of Opportunity: United States of America
* Regions of Delivery: United States of America
* Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
	+ Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada

## Additional Information

Please note that the closing time has been amended to January 10, 2024, at 14:00 EST. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by this date and time. Failure to meet this deadline may result in the bid being declared non-responsive. More details can be found
in the notice document accessible via this [link](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18353549?extsite=MTgzNTM1NDlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==).
